===Etymology===

#* {{zh-x|這個 阿山-仔，加{ke} 來 是 加{ke} 損蕩 %的 %啦{lah}|These '''mainlanders''' are coming here in droves and creating more turmoil. (This episode takes place in 1949 as refugees from the Mainland are fleeing from {{w|Mao Zedong}}'s forces to [[Taiwan]].)|TW|ref='''2003:''' {{lang|zh|公視文學大戲『家』}} ({{w|Taiwan Public Television Service Foundation}}—''Family''), episode one}}

====Usage notes====
This term was primarily used to describe non-{{w|Hoklo people}} from Mainland China, a large number of whom had emigrated to Taiwan after 1949. This term later came to be replaced by {{zh-l|外省人|[[gōa-séng-lâng]]}}.
